p.codeblock: public abstract int setBeautyEffectOptions(boolean enabled, BeautyOptions options);
virtual int setBeautyEffectOptions(bool enabled, BeautyOptions options) = 0;
public abstract int SetBeautyEffectOptions(bool enabled, BeautyOptions options);

section.p: Enables or disables image enhancement, and sets the options.

Enabling the image enhancement function involves a series of method calls. The calling sequence is as follows:
Call (agora_video_process) during initialization to integrate the video enhancement dynamic library in the project.
Link the extension library in the project file: AgoraVideoProcessExtension.framework
Link the extension library in the project file: AgoraVideoProcessExtension.xcframework
Call (libagora_video_process_extension.dll) during initialization to specify the extension library path.
Call (agora, beauty, ) to enable the extension.
Call to enable the video module.
Call this method to enable the image enhancement function.

ul.li:
Agora 从 3.6.0 版起更新了基础美颜算法，能提升基础美颜效果并支持锐度调节功能。 如果你想体验优化后的基础美颜效果或设置锐度，请在调用该方法前，将如下动态库集成到项目文件中：
Android: libagora_video_process_extension.so
Link the extension library in the project file: AgoraVideoProcessExtension.xcframework
Link the extension library in the project file: AgoraVideoProcessExtension.framework
Windows: libagora_video_process_extension.dll

section.note: This method only applies to Android 4.4 or later.

plentry.pd:
Whether to enable the image enhancement function:
: Enable the image enhancement function.
: (Default) Disable the image enhancement function.

ul.li:
< 0: Failure.
ERR_NOT_SUPPORTED(4): The system version is earlier than Android 4.4, which does not support this function.
